comments.author: MartinGC94
comments.body: I would personally find that distracting, but if this were to be implemented it should probably be in PSReadline and whichever editor you use for PowerShell. I don't think the Parser should differentiate command tokens with and without a verb.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Ideally PowerShell should support generic formatting with flexible coloring by schemas. It's not like that now.
